info.description: This API provides the Plena Global Holdings software development team with the necessary knowledge base for the integration of the different applications with the services offered by the human resources department.
info.title: HUMMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT API

ccn_employee.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

ccn_type_id.description: Integer that identified the type of identification that a person has (*) Obligatorio

full_name_employee.description: Nombre completo del empleado generado automaticamente por el sistema

date_birth_employee.description: Fecha de nacimiento del empleado (*) Obligatorio

age.description: Edad del trabajador generado automaticamente por el sistema

age_range.description: Numero entero que representa un codigo definido en la base de datos en la tabla tbl_age_range generado automaticamente por el sistema

auto_perceived_gender.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

rh.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

employee_personal_email.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

informed_consent_law_1581.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

image.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

employee_password.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

last_message_read_time.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

employee_personal_cellphone.description: Integer that identifies the type of identification that a person has

ccn_demographic_data.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

is_head_of_household.description: Check list for save if the employee is head of household

ccn_emergency_contact_details.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

emergency_contact.description: Contact name for the emergency contact

ccn_relationship.description: Relation type for the emergency contact

ccn_employment_relationship.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

ccn_employee.description: Foreign Key with the table tbl_employee

ccn_role.description: Foreign Key with the table tbl_roles

ccn_work_shift.description: Foreign Key with the table tbl_work_shift

binding_date.description: The date on which the employee joined the company

termination_date.description: The date the employee ends the contract with the company.

time_worked.example: 0 AÃ‘OS, 6 MESES Y 9 DIAS, TOTAL EN DIAS = 193
time_worked.description: Years, months, days and total days worked to the date

ccn_type_relationship.description: Foreign Key with the table tbl_type_relationship

employee_corporate_email.description: Edad del trabajador generado automaticamente por el sistema

ccn_family_nucleus.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

ccn_health_condition.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

consume_alcoholic_beverages.description: selectable field if the employee consumes alcoholic beverages

allergies.description: selectable field if the employee have allergies

what_allergy.description: field to describe that allergies have the employee

medicines.description: selectable field if the employee have medicines

what_medicin.description: field to describe that medicines have the employee

last_medical_consultation.description: selectable field with the last medical consultation

plan_to_drink_less_alcoholic_beverages.description: Selectable field if the employee plans to stop drinking

discomfort_due_to_criticism_when_ingesti.description: Selectable field if the employee disagrees with the way they drink alcohol

need_to_drink_alcohol_in_the_morning.description: Selectable field if the employee need to drink alcohol in the morning

physical_activity_3_times_a_week_30_minu.description: Selectable field if the employee realize physical activity 3 times a week 30 minutes

he_is_a_smoker.description: Selectable field if the employee is a smoker

he_is_ex_smoker.description: Selectable field if the employee is ex smoker

consume_psychoactive_substances.description: Selectable field if the employee consume psychoactive substances

used_psychoactive_substances_before.description: Selectable field if the employee used psychoactive substances before

ccn_sociodemographic_data.description: Incremental integer number assigned by the system automatically when recording a new record.

other_dependents.description: field that stores whether other people depend on the employee

relatives.description: numero de pesonas en el hogar

people_with_disabilities.description: numero de personas en situacion de discapacidad en el hogar

is_income_enougth.description: Campo seleccionable que indica si los ingresos alcanzan

where_its_located.description: en que zona esta localizada la vivienda

type_transportation.description: Tipo de transporte en el que va para el trabajo

type_transportation_2.description: Tipo de transporte opcional en el que va al trabajo

sewerage.description: Si la zona cuenta con alcantillado

aqueduct.description: Si la zona cuenta con acueducto

natural_gas.description: Si la vivenda cuenta con gas natural

landline.description: Si cuentan con telefono fijo en la casa

computer_at_home.description: si cuenta con computador en la casa

have_internet_access.description: Si cuenta con internet en casa
